Name: Rexodus: A VR Story Experience
About the game: Rexodus: A VR Story Experience is based on the Dark Horse Graphic Novel Rexodus. This is a VR narrative experience set in a universe where dinosaurs didn't go extinct, they left Earth. Those dinosaurs, utilizing their own advanced technology, are traversing the galaxy. Encounter new locations, characters, and dangerous enemies in Rexodus: A VR Story Experience!
